about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what to do when a misterious masked man with a sickle breakin into your house? Do you think you're brave enough to save yourself? Whould you run and hide or whould you face him? On "My Bloody Weekend 2" your only weapons are your fingers: will you press the keys in time? This new game from "Necronomicon Games" is a thrilling sequel set in a new rural mansion where the protagonist is discovering the truth behind this bloodshed. Following the steps of the horror-slasher b-movies this FVM story is born to give the player the same vibes and feelings, enriched with a time-based QTE gameplay.

What's new?

  • Windowed and Fullscreen switch

  • 3 ingame checkpoints in case of death

  • The player can chose between controller or keyboard (Mouse requested for both version)

  • Better and refined effects quality

  • A new playable character portrayed by a real actor

  • New lore and mistery to discover

  • A more brutal and relentless killer for a bigger difficulty

Three years are passed from the massacre of the Butterfly house ended with the murder of a young guy, Michele, and the discovery of the body of a strange masked figure. But the story is about to repeat itself. A new guest is arriving in the next house for a carefree weekend, unaware of the horrific experience he's about to live. This new chapter will bring to you new details of the cult of the ancients and their customs. Can you save yourself from the killing spree or will you fertilize the evil seed with your corpse? Get ready for the QTE.

content_descriptors.notes: numerous scenes of death by murder

short_description: "My Bloody Weekend 2" is a new survival horror experience for the MBW franchise. Try to survive at some new and improoved Quick Time Events, set in a new mansion ready to be explored. Play as a new character for this live action game. A new week is going to pass, a new terror is about to rise.
